page.title: 17LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Lacking a Community or Sports centre many people conside there is little to do in Ludlow except visit the pub.Pubs certainly provide the basis for the town's nightlife;many serve food,also provide darts, dominoes,snooker and pool,with occasional musical evenings of folk, country and western,jazz, blues and pop. There are clubs for tennis,badminton,squash,bowling,cricke t,football,rugby,golf,swimming,cycling ,fishing and canoeing. The cinema is a bingo hall and there is a library and a museum and a further education centre. Clubs and associations include:- Labour club,British Legion,Mothers union,Young Wives,Women's Institute,Young Farmers,Rotary,Rotoract and Gingerbread.
